mapper.insert: insert into task_todo (user_id, task_title, create_time, task_id, priority, complete, task_type, note_id, project_id) values (#{userId}, #{taskTitle}, #{createTime}, #{taskId}, #{priority}, #{complete}, #{taskType}, #{noteId}, #{projectId})
mapper.select: select tt.ids, tt.user_id, task_title, complete, priority, tt.create_time, task_id, task_type, note_id, tt.project_id, project_name from task_todo tt left join project p on tt.project_id = p.project_id where task_id = #{taskId}
